metadata:
========
Series: EG.ELC.RNEW.ZS

Aggregationmethod: Weighted average
--------
Generalcomments: Restricted use: Please contact the International Energy Agency for third-party use of these data.
--------
IndicatorName: Renewable electricity output (% of total electricity output)
--------
License_Type: Use and distribution of these data are subject to IEA terms and conditions.
--------
License_URL: https://www.iea.org/terms
--------
Longdefinition: Renewable electricity is the share of electrity generated by renewable power plants in total electricity generated by all types of plants.
--------
Periodicity: Annual
--------
Source: IEA Statistics © OECD/IEA 2018 (https://www.iea.org/data-and-statistics), subject to https://www.iea.org/terms/
--------
Topic: Environment: Energy production & use
description: Renewable electricity output (% of total electricity output)
